question: Who of the following won the first gold medal of the Khelo India School Games in 1500 metres?
explanation: Anu Kumar of Uttarakhand grabbed the first gold medal of the Khelo India School Games in 1500 metres at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, New Delhi. Anu Kumar is a past 800-metres silver medalist for India at the World School Games in France. The Khelo India programme has been introduced to revive the sports culture in the country at the grass-root level.
